subject: Appointment of Independent Engineer (IE) / Authority Engineer (AE) / Supervision Consultant (SC)
text: H74 74y TTTHFf mifeterrut 744 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (s7 War 3 {rTarf 4ATT4) 5477 Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) Ji-5 V 6, War-10 , ERGT , T feari-110075 6-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/Consultancy Contracts/20zo No.10./.21/2020 dated the 21st 2020 Sub: Appointment of   Independent Engineer (IE) Authority Engineer (AE) Supervision Consultant (SC) Repeated instructions were issued earlier to invite RFPs for engaging IE/ AE/SC alongwith the bids of Civil Work Contracts, but still in several projects the appointment of IE/AEISC is getting delayed. The allegations of collusion of Consulting Firms & Contractors/ Concessionaires where IE/AEISC is not appointed before award of civil works and ridiculously low bids quoted by IE/AEISC in some cases have also come to the notice. 2 In order to streamline the appointment of IE/AEISC, it has now been decided that the financial bids of Civil Work Contracts will be opened only after the award of IEIAEISC Contract. However, the commencement date of IE/AEISC Contract may be given only after Appointed Date of Civil Work Contract. If any inputs of consultant's team are required prior to this due to work requirements, the same may be allowed with approval of Member concerned: 36+up5 (R K Pandey) Member(Projects) All Officers at HQROs/PIUs/CMUs/Site Offices: '%1 RTRI AL NHAL May,_ prior
